/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. In the background, power lines stretch across the scene, adding to the urban feel of the image. On the right side of the photo, a large crane stands tall, hinting at ongoing construction or development in the area.
